title: $:/plugins/xp/theme-changer
name: Theme Changer
description: A button to switch custom themes
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/theme-changer":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/theme-changer","caption":"{{$:/xp/images/theme}} theme changer","description":"Quickly switch custom themes","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","text":"\whitespace trim \define styleTiddlers() $:/xp/theme-changer/styles/DarkGreen $:/xp/theme-changer/styles/EyeCareGreen $:/xp/theme-changer/styles/EyeCareGreen2 \end \define themeChanger() \whitespace trim <$button popup=<> tooltip="Switch custom themes" aria-label="theme changer" class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/theme}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="theme changer"/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[[$:/palettes/Vanilla]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Palette]prefix[$:/xp/theme-changer/palettes]sort[]] [[$:/palettes/SolarFlare]]"> <$button set="$:/palette" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!css}} $tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/> <$transclude field="name"/> <$list filter="[{$:/palette}match]">  ✓
\end 一个切换自定义主题（包含调色板和样式表）的按钮。"},"$:/xp/theme-changer/styles/DarkGreen":{"title":"$:/xp/theme-changer/styles/DarkGreen","text":"
/*************************************************
 *  TIDDLYWIKI
 *************************************************/

select {
    color: <>;
    background: <>;
    border-radius: 2px;
    outline: none;
}

select:focus { border: 1px solid <>; }


/* Horizontal Rule */

hr {
    height: 0;
    border: none;
    border-top: 2px solid #595959 !important;
}


/* Dropdowns */

.tc-block-dropdown {
    background-color: <>;
}


/* Highlight */

.hljs {
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
    background: #2a2a2a;
}


/* Styling Inputs */

input { outline: none; }

input:focus { box-shadow: 0 0 2px 0.51px <>; }

textarea, input, input:not([type]), input[type="email" i], input[type="number" i], input[type="password" i], input[type="tel" i], input[type="url" i], input[type="text" i], input[type=text], input[type=search], input[type=""] {
    background: <>;
    border: 2px solid <>;
}

input[type=search] {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04) !important;
}

input[type="email" i], input[type="number" i], input[type="password" i], input[type="tel" i], input[type="url" i] {
    border: 2px inset rgb(100, 100, 100);
    height: 1.6em;
    color: <>;
}

.xp-gtd-addtodo-textbox-input {
    border: none !important;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted <> !important;
    background: transparent !important;
}

.xp-gtd-addtodo-textbox-input:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <> !important;
    background: transparent;
    <>
}


/* Styling Buttons */

.tc-btn-standard {
    color: #e0e0e0;
    background-color: #444;
}

button {
    border: 1px solid <>;
    border-radius: 3px;
    padding: 2px 7px;
}

button:hover { background: <>; }
button.tc-btn-invisible:hover,
button.tc-btn-mini:hover,
.tc-tiddler-controls button:hover,
.tc-topbar button:hover,
.tc-page-controls button:hover,
.tc-search button:hover
{
    background: none;
}
.tc-editor-toolbar button:hover { background-color: <>; }
.tc-drop-down button:hover,
button.tc-primary-btn:hover,
button.tc-btn-big-green:hover {
    background: <>;
}
.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-image-delete-button:hover,
.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-image-trash-alt:hover {
    color: #CC0033 !important;
    fill: #CC0033 !important;
}
.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-image-cancel-button:hover {
    color: rgba(255,204,0,0.77) !important;
    fill: rgba(255,204,0,0.77) !important;
}
.edit-btn-icon.save-open:hover {
    color: rgba(153,204,0,0.9) !important;
    fill: rgba(153,204,0,0.9) !important;
}
.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-image-done-button:hover {
    color: #4cb77c !important;
    fill: #4cb77c !important;
}

/* Button hover for Dropdown and Dropup */

.tc-drop-down a:hover, .tc-drop-down button:hover, .tc-drop-down .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-popup button:hover, .xp-popup .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-drop-up a:hover, .xp-drop-up button:hover, .xp-drop-up .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-drop-up-scope a:hover, .xp-drop-up-scope button:hover, .xp-drop-up-scope .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-tag-handler-dropdown a:hover, .xp-tag-handler-dropdown button:hover {
    color: <>;
    background-color: <>;
    text-decoration: none;
}

/* Tab buttons */

.tc-tab-buttons button:hover {
    color: <>;
    fill: <>;
    background: none;
}

.tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected:hover {
    background: <>;
}

.tc-drop-down .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected,
.xp-popup-showtid .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    background-color: <>;
}

.tc-drop-down .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected:hover,
.xp-popup-showtid .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected:hover {
    background: <>;
}

/* Vertical tab buttons */

.tc-tab-content.tc-vertical {
    border-color: <>;
}

.tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button.tc-tab-selected {
    border: 1px solid <>;
    border-right: none;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item > a:hover {
    background: rgba(33, 33, 33, 0.4);
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item-selected > a {
    background: rgba(33, 33, 33, 0.5);
    border-left: 2px outset <>;
}

/* Tiddler info tab buttons */

.tc-tiddler-info .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    background-color: <>;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <>;
}

/* Sidebar tab buttons */

<$list filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout]get[text]] +[else[fluid-fixed]!match[fixed-fluid]]" variable="ignore">
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button:hover {
    color: <>;
    fill: <>;
    background: none;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    color: <>;
    fill: <>;
    border-color: <>;
<$reveal state="$:/theme" type="match" text="$:/themes/xp-k">
    background: <>;

}


<$list filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout]get[text]] +[else[fixed-fluid]!match[fluid-fixed]]" variable="ignore">
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    color: <>;
    fill: <>;
    background: <>;
    border-color: <>;
}


<$reveal state="$:/theme" type="match" text="$:/themes/xp-j">
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected:hover {
    background: <>;
}


/* Sidebar more tab buttons */

.tc-more-sidebar .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical > button {
    border-right: 1px solid transparent;
}

.tc-more-sidebar > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons > button {
    border-right: 1px solid transparent;
}


/* Open tab tiddlylink */

.tc-sidebar-tab-open.sq-sidebar-open a.tc-tiddlylink,
.tc-sidebar-lists a.tc-tiddlylink {
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.54);
}


/*
** Manager
*/

.tc-manager-list-item-heading:hover {
    background: <> !important;
    color: <> !important;
}

.tc-manager-list-item-content-item-heading {
    background: <> !important;
}


/* Plugin info */

.tc-plugin-info,
.tc-plugin-info-dropdown {
    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}

.tc-plugin-info-disabled {
    background: -webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #6e6d22, #6e6d22 10px, #345 10px, #345 20px);
    background: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #6e6d22, #6e6d22 10px, #345 10px, #345 20px);
}

.tc-plugin-info-disabled:hover {
    background: -webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #aa0, #aa0 10px, #888 10px, #888 20px);
    background: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #aa0, #aa0 10px, #888 10px, #888 20px);
}



/*************************************************
 *  PLUGINS
 *************************************************/

/* LeftOpenTab
** $:/plugins/xp/leftopentab
*/

.leftopentab-titlebar-semicircle,
.leftopentab-titlebar-square {
    background-color: rgba(45, 45, 45, 1) !important;
}


<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tobibeer/appear]type[application/json]]" variable="ignore">
/* Appear > Preview
** $:/plugins/tobibeer/appear/styles
*/

.tc-popup.appear {
    background: rgba(46, 46, 46, 0.8) !important;
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}



/* Projectify
** $:/plugins/nico/projectify/styles/stylesheet
*/

.py-btn {
    border: 1px solid rgb(110, 110, 110) !important;
}


/* $:/xp/diary/card-template
** $:/_tw5.com-styles
*/

.tc-card {
	border-top: 5px solid #171717;
	box-shadow: 0 8px 17px -8px #777;
	background-color: <>;
}

.tc-card:hover {
	box-shadow: 0 5px 15px #597e2f;
}

.tc-card:hover .tc-card-title {
	color: <>;
}

.tc-card a {
	color: <>;
}
"},"$:/xp/theme-changer/styles/EyeCareGreen":{"title":"$:/xp/theme-changer/styles/EyeCareGreen","text":"
/*************************************************
 *  TIDDLYWIKI
 *************************************************/

.tc-tiddler-frame {
    <>
}

.tc-sidebar-header { text-shadow: none; }

select {
    color: <>;
    background-color: #d1ddcb;
    border-radius: 2px;
    outline: none;
}

select:focus { border: 1px solid <>; }


/* Horizontal Rule */

hr {
    height: 0;
    border: none;
    border-top: 1px solid #9ca793 !important;
}


/* Dropdowns */

.tc-block-dropdown{
    background-color: #d4dece;
}


/* Details */

details {
    background-color: #cbd7c3;
}


/* Highlight */

.hljs {
    color: #3b302e;
    background: <>;
}


/* Styling Inputs */

input { outline: none; }

input:focus { box-shadow: 0 0 2px 0.13px <>; }

textarea, input, input:not([type]), input[type="email" i], input[type="number" i], input[type="password" i], input[type="tel" i], input[type="url" i], input[type="text" i], input[type=text], input[type=search], input[type=""] {
    color: #333333;
    border: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25) !important;
}

input[type="email" i], input[type="number" i], input[type="password" i], input[type="tel" i], input[type="url" i] {
    border: 1px solid rgb(118, 118, 118);
    border-radius: 2px;
    line-height: 1.35;
}

input[type="password" i]:focus {
    border: 1px solid #ce6d6c;
    box-shadow: none;
}

.tc-edit-tags { border: none !important; }

.xp-gtd-addtodo-textbox-input {
    border: none !important;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted <> !important;
    background: transparent !important;
}

.xp-gtd-addtodo-textbox-input:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <> !important;
    background: transparent;
    <>
}


/* Styling Buttons */

.tc-btn-standard {
    color: #e0e0e0;
    background-color: <>;
}

button {
    border: 1px solid <>;
    border-radius: 2px;
    padding: 2px 7px;
}

button:hover { background: <>; }
button.tc-btn-invisible:hover,
button.tc-btn-mini:hover,
.tc-tiddler-controls button:hover,
.tc-topbar button:hover,
.tc-page-controls button:hover,
.tc-search button:hover
{
    background: none;
}
.tc-editor-toolbar button:hover { background-color: <>; }
.tc-drop-down button:hover,
button.tc-primary-btn:hover {
    background: <>;
}
button.tc-btn-big-green:hover { background: #34c734; }

/* Button hover for Dropdown and Dropup */

.tc-drop-down a:hover, .tc-drop-down button:hover, .tc-drop-down .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-popup button:hover, .xp-popup .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-drop-up a:hover, .xp-drop-up button:hover, .xp-drop-up .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-drop-up-scope a:hover, .xp-drop-up-scope button:hover, .xp-drop-up-scope .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.xp-tag-handler-dropdown a:hover, .xp-tag-handler-dropdown button:hover {
    color: <>;
    background-color: <>;
    text-decoration: none;
}

/* Tab buttons */

.tc-tab-buttons button:hover {
    background: <>;
}

.tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected:hover {
    background: <>;
}

.tc-drop-down .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected,
.xp-popup-showtid .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    background-color: <>;
}

/* Tiddler info tab buttons */

.tc-tiddler-info .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    background-color: <>;
}

/* Sidebar tab buttons */

<$list filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout]get[text]] +[else[fluid-fixed]!match[fixed-fluid]]" variable="ignore">
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button:hover {
<$reveal state="$:/theme" type="match" text="$:/themes/xp-k">
    background: none;

<$reveal state="$:/theme" type="nomatch" text="$:/themes/xp-k">
    background: <>;

}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    color: <>;
    fill: <>;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected:hover {
    background: <>;
}

<$reveal state="$:/theme" type="match" text="$:/themes/xp-k">
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button:hover {
    background: <>;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button.tc-tab-selected {
    border: 1px solid <>;
    border-right: 1px solid <>;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button.tc-tab-selected:hover {
    background: none;
}



<$list filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout]get[text]] +[else[fixed-fluid]!match[fluid-fixed]]" variable="ignore">
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button:hover {
    background: <>;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
    color: <>;
    fill: <>;
    background: <>;
}


/* Sidebar more tab buttons */

.tc-more-sidebar .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical > button {
    border-right: 1px solid <>;
}


/* Open tab tiddlylink */

.tc-sidebar-tab-open.sq-sidebar-open a.tc-tiddlylink,
.tc-sidebar-lists a.tc-tiddlylink {
    color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.47);
}


/*
** Manager
*/

.tc-manager-list-item-heading:hover {
    background: <> !important;
    color: <> !important;
}

.tc-manager-list-item-content-item-heading {
    background: <> !important;
}



/*************************************************
 *  PLUGINS
 *************************************************/

/* LeftOpenTab
** $:/plugins/xp/leftopentab
*/

.leftopentab-titlebar-semicircle,
.leftopentab-titlebar-square {
	background-color: rgba(165, 178, 155, 0.21) !important;
}


<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tobibeer/appear]type[application/json]]" variable="ignore">
/* Appear > Preview
** $:/plugins/tobibeer/appear/styles
*/

.tc-popup.appear {
    background: rgba(193, 207, 182, 0.83) !important;
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}



/* Projectify
** $:/plugins/nico/projectify/styles/stylesheet
*/

.py-btn {
    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important;
}


/* $:/xp/diary/card-template
** $:/_tw5.com-styles
*/

.tc-card {
	box-shadow: 0 8px 17px -8px #777;
	background-color: <>;
}

.tc-card:hover {
	box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 128, 128, 0.3);
}

.tc-card:hover .tc-card-title {
	color: <>;
}

.tc-card a {
	color: <>;
}


/* Favorites
** $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/style.css
*/

.kk-btn-mini svg {
	fill: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
}
